custom_params.label: FLW
custom_params.tooltip: Flow rate - volume of water moving

custom_params.label: DRP
custom_params.tooltip: Drop height - vertical distance of falls

custom_params.label: STN
custom_params.tooltip: Stone smoothness - texture of the rock bed

custom_params.label: SPA
custom_params.tooltip: Spatial spread - width of the cascade

custom_params.label: SHM
custom_params.tooltip: Shimmer - light catching on water droplets
